round_3: Fabhind Private Limited, GIDC Vatwa, Ahmedabad, Gujarat - Established in 2005, we are Manufacturer of 100 TPH Asphalt Batch Mix Plant, Asphalt Hot Mix Machine, Drum Mix Asphalt Plant, Asphalt Hot Mix Plant and Building & Construction Machines
round_4: Fabhind Private Limited is a manufacturing company based in Vatva GIDC Vatwa, Ahmedabad, Gujarat, India. Established in 2005, the company specializes in the production of road construction machinery, including asphalt batch mix plants, drum mix asphalt plants, hot mix plants for road construction, and waste tyre pyrolysis plants. Fabhind is a leading manufacturer, exporter, and supplier of waste tyre recycling plants and road construction machines. The company's products are known for their trouble-free operations, lower maintenance, and robust construction. Fab-India is an integrated company with a multifunctional workforce that has vast knowledge of machinery and experience in different fields.
